name: Solo Dracula Hero
description:
The Solo Dracula will face- fight bravely with other the super aggressive fighters.

In Solo Halloween Hero, You are a alone hero and your mission is defeating all equiped foes and protect your family, your residents from the monster in Halloween coming

You will clash unlimited foes with your familiar weapon: a bow. On the Road, you have to fight against their forces, too. Be careful! Any wrong shooting , you will die by the kill shot of enemies. The raid are so dangerous

The more ninja you shoot down, the more point you get and you can upgrade main character by using coin

How to play Solo Dracula Hero:

- Just tap on screen when you choose the suitable moment to release shot

Features in Solo Dracula Hero:

- Graphic: 2D, Simple, spectacular

- Easy to play

- Close to player

- Unlimited level

Don't miss an endless minigame! Let's explore now

P/s: We we are looking for a publisher collaborator or co-operate with other team to bid out-source code. If you have demand and intention to co-operate with us, Please contact with us via this facebook link: https://www.facebook.com/StomStudio
